        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>evaluate sm_m2m_mobel_knowledge ACL condition</description>
        <name>MobelKnowledgeACLCondition</name>
        <script><![CDATA[
			var MobelKnowledgeACLCondition = Class.create();
MobelKnowledgeACLCondition.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    isSncInternalUserOnly: function() {
        var answer = false;
        var userId = gs.getUserID();
		
        var roles = new GlideAggregate("sys_user_has_role");
        roles.addAggregate("COUNT");
        roles.addQuery("user", userId);
        roles.addActiveQuery();
        roles.query();
		
        var count = 0;
        if (roles.next()) {
            count = roles.getAggregate("COUNT");
        }

        if ((count > 1) && (gs.hasRole("snc_internal"))) {
            answer = true;
        }

		return answer;
    },

    type: 'MobelKnowledgeACLCondition'
};]]></script>
